advisory.description: Abu Shohel Ahmed from Ericsson reported a vulnerability in Keystone V3 API authentication. By sending a single request with the same authentication method multiple times, a remote attacker may generate unwanted load on the Keystone host, potentially resulting in a Denial of Service against a Keystone service. Only Keystone setups enabling V3 API are affected.
advisory.title: Keystone DoS through V3 API authentication chaining
